item.description:
Full Moon Paddle - Whitehall Reservoir in Hopkinton

Saturday August 16, meet at 9:45, launch by 10:00 PM.

Will cancel if forecast to be cloudy.

PLEASE - no first-time paddlers on this trip

It is REQUIRED that each kayak have a light of some sort and as usual all paddlers must wear a PFD.

For more information on the location - http://www.mass.gov/d...

It's directly on Rt. 135 in Hopkinton. I'll leave it to everyone to check a map for their best way there.
item.name: Full Moon Paddle - Whitehall Reservoir in Hopkinton
